synopsis:
From the combined creators of Yuri On Ice and Legend of Korra, it's Yaoi on Fire! Coming off a bad break-up, May returns to her home on the Polynesian-inspired fantasy islands known as Yao'ii. When superstar fire dancer, Val, notices her moves in a club, May gets her groove back learning the traditional art form. But as the competitions heat up, she finds that she got more than she bargained for in her tantalizing new teacher.

(Source: DeviantArt Originals)
